description:
末日之後，我們打造方舟。
諾亞方舟是聖經中為人所熟悉的故事，故事最後， 上帝以彩虹為立約的記號， 不再因人的緣故詛咒大地， 並使各種生物存留永不停息。 然而在末日之後， 我們賦予方舟另一層意義。 我們打造的這座方舟， 將張開雙臂， 歡迎來自任何國家、種族、宗教、文化的旅人， 並付出我們的「真誠」， 提供「幸福」、「精緻」、「貼心」的旅宿記憶。

The ARK was constructed after the end of the world.
Noah's Ark is a well-known Bible story. At the end of the story, God makes the rainbow as a symbol of his promise. Never again destroy the world because of the wickedness of mankind. Give all the creatures a covenant to survive. 

After the end of the world, We create another ARK. Welcome all the travelers from different nations, races, religions, and cultures. Our hospitality is from the bottom of our hearts. Wish you a delicate and delightful memory in this lovely island.
